message.name: ERR_ORGUNIT_XRV_LEADPOSITION_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: A lead position must exist for the parent organization unit before a child organization unit can be added to it.
A lead position must exist for the parent organisation unit before a child organisation unit can be added to it.

message.name: ERR_ORGUNIT_XRV_PARENTCHILD
message.locale: This organization unit cannot be added because the parent organization unit is not in the same organization structure.
This organisation unit cannot be added because the parent organisation unit is not in the same organisation structure.

message.name: ERR_ORGUNIT_FV_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: Organization unit name must be entered.
Organisation unit name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ORGUNIT_XRV_NAME_EXIST
message.locale: An Organization Unit with this name already exists in this structure.
Organisation unit name already exists in this organisation structure.

message.name: ERR_ORGUNIT_FV_STATUS_EMPTY
message.locale: Organization unit status must be entered.
Organisation unit status must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ORGUNIT_FV_STRUCTURE_EMPTY
message.locale: Organization structure must be entered.
Organisation structure must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ORGUNIT_FV_CREATION_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: Creation date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ORGUNIT_XRV_ROOTORGUNIT_EXISTS
message.locale: A root organization unit already exists for this organization structure.
A root organisation unit already exists for this organisation structure.

message.name: ERR_ORGUNIT_FV_PARENT_EMPTY
message.locale: A parent organization unit must be entered.
A parent organisation unit must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ORGUNIT_FV_CHILD_EMPTY
message.locale: A child organization unit must be entered.
A child organisation unit must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ORGUNIT_FV_PARENT_ALREADYPARENT
message.locale: The parent organization unit selected is already the parent organization for this organization structure.
The parent organisation unit selected is already the parent organisation for this organisation structure.

message.name: ERR_PARENTUNIT_XRV_IN_OTHER_STRUCTURE
message.locale: The parent organization unit must be in the same organization structure as this organization unit.
The parent organisation unit must be in the same organisation structure as this organisation unit.

message.name: ERR_CHILD_ORGUNITS_STILL_EXIST
message.locale: Cannot delete this organization unit as there are still active child organization units.
Cannot delete this organisation unit as there are still active child organisation units.

message.name: ERR_ORGUNIT_ASSIGNEDPOSITIONS_EXIST
message.locale: Cannot delete this organization unit as there are still users assigned to positions within the organization unit.
Cannot delete this organisation unit as there are still users assigned to positions within the organisation unit.

message.name: ERR_ADD_CHILD_ORGUNITS_CANCELED_PARENT_ORGUNIT
message.locale: Cannot add a child organization unit to a canceled parent organization unit.
Cannot add a child organisation unit to a cancelled parent organisation unit.

message.name: ERR_ORGUNIT_NO_LEAD_POSIITON_EXIST
message.locale: There must be at least one lead position for the parent organization unit which you are adding the child organization unit to.
There must be at least one lead position for the parent organisation unit which you are adding the child organisation unit to.

message.name: ERR_ADD_CHILD_ORGUNITS_CANCELED_ORGANISATION_STRUCTURE
message.locale: Cannot add or modify an organization unit to a canceled organization structure.
Cannot add or modify an organisation unit to a cancelled organisation structure.

message.name: ERR_ORGANISATIONSECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the required privileges to perform this task.

message.name: ERR_WORK_ORGUNIT_XRV_CASE_OWNER
message.locale: This organization unit is the owner of one or more cases and therefore cannot be canceled.
This organisation unit is the owner of one or more cases and therefore cannot be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_ORGUNIT_TEMPORAL_EVIDENCE_APPROVAL_CLOSED_ORGUNIT
message.locale: You cannot create organization unit temporal evidence approval on a cancelled organization unit.
You cannot create organisation unit temporal evidence approval on a cancelled organisation unit.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_RESOURCE_CLOSED_ORGUNIT
message.locale: You cannot create resource on a cancelled organization unit.
You cannot create resource on a cancelled organisation unit.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_POSITION_TEMPORAL_EVIDENCE_APPROVAL_CLOSED_ORGUNIT
message.locale: You cannot create position temporal evidence approval on a cancelled organization unit.
You cannot create position temporal evidence approval on a cancelled organisation unit.

message.name: ERR_ASSIGN_RESOURCE_CLOSED_ORGUNIT
message.locale: You cannot assign resource on a cancelled organization unit.
You cannot assign resource on a cancelled organisation unit.

message.name: INF_ORGUNIT_SEARCH_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: There are no matching items based on the Search Criteria entered.

message.name: ERR_ORGANISATIONSECURITY_MODIFY_USER_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have sufficient privileges to maintain a user for %1s.
